subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: By losing to the stubborn Milwaukee Brewers on Sunday for the second straight day, the Padres have to play a one-game playoff Monday with the Rockies at Coors Field for the N.L. wild card.
snippet: By losing to the stubborn Milwaukee Brewers on Sunday for the second straight day, the Padres have to play a one-game playoff Monday with the Rockies at Coors Field for the N.L. wild card.
